data.text: Chinatenda wandima hamwenga na Chohile, chawalombezani msekuzumila chiya wedi mhokele kulaila kwa Chohile chage bule.
Hachikunga kutenda nkobadiko mwe mbuli yoyose, chani ndima yetu isekufuzumilwa.
Mna chelongela wenye kugamba chindedi chi wandima wa Chohile kwa chila chintu, kwa ujijimizi ulozize mwe chipindi cha masulumizo, madala na nkunto.
Chitoigwa, chifungwa na kuzomwa mo lumpe, chidamanya ndima niyo chasokela, chicheleza na kwikala na sala.
Chelagisa kugamba suwe chi wandima wa Chohile kwa sila ya wedi we myoyo yetu, na umanyi wa ujijimizi na wedi wetu, na kwa Muye Ukukile, mwe chindedi chetu cho ungi,
kwa ulosi wa chindedi na kwa nguvu ya Chohile. Wedi nicho chiziha chetu chi kumuwagila Chohile cha kwedima kulume na kumoso.
Chatunya na kubelwa, chalongelwa yehiye na kulongelwa yedi. Chafanyanywa kugamba chiwadanti, kumbe chalonga chindedi,
saviya hewemanyike, kumbe chimanyika kwa wose, saviya wabanike, mna sevyo mkuwona, suwe chiwajima.
Hata hegu china chinyulu, mazuwa yose chelelwa, hata hegu chiwachiwa, mna chatenda walozize wagoli, kumbe china chila chintu.
Walukolo uko Kolinto, chitamwila na nyuwe pwilili naho chiwagubwila vidala imyoyo yetu.
Suwe hachichindile imyoyo yetu, mna nyuwe nawo mchindile imyoyo yenyu.
Haluse nalonga na nyuwe saviya hulonga na wanangu, gubulani imyoyo yenyu saviya suwe chiwagubwile iyetu.
Mse kutimilana na wantu hewezumile. Togolani, utana na wihi vyevana chindedi? Ung'azi na chiza vyevana?
Kulisito adaha kwivana na Shetani? Mkanuni ana wivano wani na hezumile?

Nyumba ya Chohile ina wivano wani na matukulu? Kwaviya suwe chi nyumba nkulu ya Chohile emjima. Saviya Chohile mwenye alongile, “Nanike kaya yangu kwawo, na kwikala mwawo. Nanitende Chohile ywawo, nawo nawatende wantu wangu.”
Ivyo Zumbe alonga naho, “Mhalawe mwawo, mwenege nawo, mse kukufya chintu chichafu, miye nami naniwahokele.
Miye nanitende Tati yenyu, nanyuwe namtende wanangu, wagosi kwa wavyele, alonga Zumbe Chohile Mkulu mta Nguvu.”
